mapper.select: SELECT notice_id AS noticeId, lecture_id AS lectureId, notice_type AS noticeType, title, content, last_update AS lastUpdate FROM notice ORDER BY last_update DESC
SELECT notice_id AS noticeId, lecture_id AS lectureId, notice_type AS noticeType, title, content, last_update AS lastUpdate FROM notice WHERE notice_id = #{noticeId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (lecture_id, notice_type, title, content, last_update) VALUES (#{lectureId}, #{noticeType}, #{title}, #{content}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET lecture_id = #{lectureId}, notice_type = #{noticeType}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, last_update = NOW() WHERE notice_id = #{noticeId}
